# Suksan Massage - AI Agent Guidance

## About
Suksan Massage offers authentic traditional Thai, Oil, Back & Neck, and Foot Reflexology massages in the heart of Bern (Breitenrain). Founded by Wat Pho certified therapist Mrs. Kumjuan Vecchi.

## Services & Pricing
- **Traditional Thai Massage (Nuad Thai)**: Therapeutic, combines acupressure & yoga.
  - 30 min: 60 CHF | 45 min: 80 CHF | 60 min: 90 CHF | 90 min: 130 CHF
- **Oil & Relax Massage**: Gentle, aromatic oils, stress relief.
  - 30 min: 60 CHF | 45 min: 80 CHF | 60 min: 90 CHF | 90 min: 130 CHF
- **Back & Neck Massage**: Targeted tension relief.
  - 30 min: 60 CHF | 45 min: 80 CHF | 60 min: 90 CHF | 90 min: 130 CHF
- **Foot Reflexology**: Promotes overall well-being.
  - 30 min: 60 CHF | 45 min: 80 CHF | 60 min: 90 CHF | 90 min: 130 CHF

## Key Information
- **Address**: Weingartstrasse 57 UG, 3014 Bern, Switzerland
- **Transport**: Bus 20 (Breitfeld) or Tram 9 (Breitenrein)
- **Phone**: +41 76 259 05 33
- **Booking**: https://suksan-massage.com/contact (Online Booking Form available)
- **Payment**: Cash or TWINT (on site)

## Opening Hours
- **Mon - Fri**: 09:00 - 22:00
- **Sat**: 09:00 - 22:00
- **Sun**: Closed

## FAQ Highlights
- **Insurance**: Not directly covered, but prices are competitively low comparable to deductibles.
- **Clothing**: Traditional clothing provided for Thai massage; draping used for Oil massage.
- **Facilities**: Shower available.

## Site Structure
- **Home**: https://suksan-massage.com/
- **Services**: https://suksan-massage.com/services
- **Contact/Booking**: https://suksan-massage.com/contact
